settings.text: Georgia Grace is a certified sex and relationship practitioner. With years of qualifications and experience in somatic sexology she works in session with couples and individuals, runs events and workshops, delivers sex ed to universities and is NORMAL's in-house sexual wellness advisor.

Georgia appears regularly in the media, writing for a range of global publications, commenting on social and cultural sex trends on national radio and talking about all things sexual wellness on shows like The Bachelor and The Hook Up. She also works behind the scenes developing online education programs, hosting podcasts, designing sexual wellness products and working as an advisor to some of the most innovative sexual wellness brands. You can also find her delivering bite-sized education through her Instagram

settings.text: Feeling distracted, anxious or unable to relax is really common. Georgia shares some powerful techniques, and leads a guided meditation to end the course.

From exploring your turn ons and turn offs, to guided meditations and a 30-day self-pleasure enquiry calendar, take all of the lessons from the course and put them into practice with worksheets you can use at home.
